name: politico
text:
Biden was just about the last Democrat progressives wanted as the nominee.

But now that he‚Äôs the one taking on Trump, they‚Äôre working harder to put him in office than they did for Hillary Clinton ‚Äî and they're planning to give him hell the minute he wins https://t.co/TE9Ezyl0Xv

name: politico
text: The University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill is ending in-person instruction for undergrads just a week after reopening after dozens of students living in dorms and a fraternity house tested positive for #COVID19 https://t.co/qAKytTPGLB

name: politico
text:
A few more things we're watching tonight:
‚Ä¢ Michelle Obama's speech
‚Ä¢ How Bernie Sanders' speech differs from 4 years ago
‚Ä¢ Joe Biden's racial justice conversation (it's uncommon to see the soon-to-be nominee on the first night)

More live analysis: https://t.co/b05DYRNlNf

name: politico
text: The DNC begins. Speaking tonight: Michelle Obama, Bernie Sanders, Republican John Kasich and more. Live analysis: https://t.co/Yf4BFttio1 https://t.co/VSJDrvtpCE

name: politico
text:
Obama's 2004 ‚ÄúPurple America‚Äù speech was, in part, so great because you could feel the electricity of the crowd, says reporter @MarcACaputo. That's gone this year. 

Will it be possible to reproduce a moment like that virtually? 

(Live analysis: https://t.co/Yf4BFtbHwt)

name: politico
text: President Trump wanted to shut off emergency relief for California amid devastating wildfires because it was a blue state, and he tried to deliberately separate families to deter immigration, according to a former administration official https://t.co/nEB9mVh9bo

name: politico
text:
George Floyd's brothers spoke at the DNC tonight. The address was followed by a moment of silence for Floyd and other victims of police violence. #DNCConvention

More live analysis: https://t.co/Yf4BFttio1 https://t.co/m4pUSyl90z

text: RT @SallyGold: It sums up a lot about @NYGovCuomo & @NYCMayor that despite both having problems w/ their COVID responses - Cuomo w/ nursing homes, BDB w/ his health dept - Cuomo has a fairly prominent #DNC2020 speaking slot and BDB earlier today said he forgot it was this week.It sums up a lot about @NYGovCuomo & @NYCMayor that despite both having problems w/ their COVID responses - Cuomo w‚Ä¶ https://t.co/XkY3IhIp56

text: Joe Biden says he contemplated suicide following the 1972 car crash that killed his wife and daughter, opening up about his personal encounters with loss in pre-released clips on Monday from an upcoming documentary https://t.co/ixAG6BpWvD

name: politico
text:
Urquiza previously told @lbarronlopez: "I worked really hard to try and save [him] and I couldn't...that's why I'm angry. I would be processing this completely different if the circumstances surrounding the leadership & policy decisions had been different"

name: politico
text: The Democratic National Convention has a distinctly different feel this year, with the #Covid pandemic pushing it to a virtual affair that lacks raucous crowds, behind-the-scenes dealmaking and the general pizzazz of a political celebration https://t.co/dPmuKoV4px

name: politico
text:
The opening night featured a moment of silence for George Floyd, the Black man killed by Minneapolis police in May.

Floyd's brother commended the protests against racial injustice as a fitting tribute and listed the names of others killed by police https://t.co/dPmuKoV4px

name: politico
text: A Virginia state senator has been charged with damaging a Confederate monument in Portsmouth during protests that also led to a demonstrator being critically injured when a statue was torn down https://t.co/V7n4qjpkBc

name: politico
text:
"Going high is the only thing that works." Michelle Obama revisited her famous lines from 2016 during the #DemConvention tonight.

More live analysis: https://t.co/XH3sVu9eCO

name: politico
text:
Obama has been able to build a sense of intimacy that really is effective, says @ec_schneider. Even the shot (framing her face, tightly focused) creates that feeling.

https://t.co/XH3sVu9eCO

text:
Some of the strongest moments tonight weren‚Äôt speeches by politicians, says @lbarronlopez. "The memoriam of lives lost to Covid and Biden‚Äôs history of riding Amtrak and the people he spoke to along the way ‚Äì those to me were the most striking"

https://t.co/b05DYRNlNf

name: politico
text:
Despite the personal attacks that have streamed from the Trump White House, former first lady Michelle Obama is sticking by her mantra of going high when others go low:

‚ÄúGoing high is the only thing that works,‚Äù she said during the #DNCConvention¬† https://t.co/YqxPpRtZgy https://t.co/YQK2H2XwoD

name: politico
text:
Former Ohio Gov. John Kasich stood at a literal crossroads as he talked about his choice to vote for Joe Biden. ‚ÄúI'm a lifelong Republican, but that attachment holds second place to my responsibility to my country,‚Äù he said.

#DemConvention key moments: https://t.co/FNYJjoOjM9 https://t.co/iYxX9WLqo2

name: politico
text:
Nevada Sen. Catherine Cortez Masto called out Trump for attacking mail-in voting, pointing out how he himself has requested absentee ballots twice this year. ‚ÄúTrump is trying to divide us by undermining that right,‚Äù she said.

More DNC key moments: https://t.co/FNYJjoOjM9 https://t.co/ZggSWGZL23

name: politico
text: P.S. Sen. Catherine Cortez Masto, like Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer, will be one of the names you'll hear a lot a‚Ä¶ https://t.co/AB706UB9Xg

name: politico
text:
‚ÄúMost cops are good,‚Äù Biden said during a DNC panel on police violence. ‚ÄúThe fact is that the bad ones have to be identified, prosecuted and out, period.‚Äù

It was a contrast from the repeated calls from Trump‚Äôs camp that Biden's out to ‚Äúdefund the police.‚Äù https://t.co/FNYJjoOjM9 https://t.co/rPB0FMlU2C

text: President Trump said he had rejected a proposal working its way through the Pentagon to cut military health services by $2.2 billion as part of an overall spending review https://t.co/T9yomTqgrA
